statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'success';
SELECT transaction_type, AVG(transaction_amount) as average_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'success' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_status FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 100 AND transaction_type = 'refund'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'pending' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT metadata_id, transaction_id, user_id, action FROM metadata WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM metadata WHERE action IN ('create', 'update') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM transactions WHERE description LIKE '%payment%' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT metadata.metadata_id, transactions.transaction_id, metadata.timestamp, transactions.amount FROM metadata JOIN transactions ON metadata.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id WHERE metadata.action = 'refund' ORDER BY transactions.amount ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE description ILIKE '%purchase%' OR description ILIKE '%sale%' ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM metadata ORDER BY metadata_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT transaction_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value, COUNT(*) FROM metadata GROUP BY metadata_key, metadata_value HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, action, user_id FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'DELETE' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, metadata_value FROM transaction_metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'category';
SELECT action_taken, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_date, ta.username FROM transaction_history th JOIN user_accounts ta ON th.user_id = ta.user_id WHERE th.transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY th.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT tm.metadata_key, tm.metadata_value FROM transaction_metadata tm WHERE tm.transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transaction_history WHERE amount < 500) ORDER BY tm.metadata_key ASC;

SELECT CONCAT(u.username, ' - ', u.email) AS user_info, a.action_taken, a.timestamp FROM user_accounts u JOIN audit_trails a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_date, tm.metadata_key, tm.metadata_value FROM transaction_history th LEFT JOIN transaction_metadata tm ON th.transaction_id = tm.transaction_id WHERE tm.metadata_key = 'category' ORDER BY th.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_account;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT timestamp, description FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, action FROM audit_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, account_number, balance FROM user_account WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM transaction_metadata WHERE transaction_id = 100 ORDER BY metadata_key ASC;
